name: Globoid
description:
Globoid!

The game has now been released!

There is currently a version for: Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux. There will be a version for Android coming out soon.

There is currently one level, with many more to come.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, you can contact me at:

amartrivedi.mobile@gmail.com

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You are a sphere and must make it to the other side! Easier said then done!

You must navigate through, collecting all of the Pickups as you can!

More features will be implemented soon!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer: By downloading and/or playing any copy of this game, you accept the EULA terms and agreement. A copy comes with your game, and you can download one separately as well.
